bug.short_desc: Reconciler reports AST with wrong node range (with comment after return type)

long_desc.thetext:
4.5.0.I20140909-1315, already happens with 4.4.0.I20140606-1215
- Launch Eclipse with these debug options enabled: org.eclipse.jdt.core/debug=true org.eclipse.jdt.core/debug/dom/ast=true
- Paste the source cited in the error message to the Package Explorer. - Set caret after "{" - Press Space, wait for the reconciler. => Error in the log. => The range of the first method parameter is "/*int*/ realpath(byte[] path".
A visible effect of this is that "Edit > Expand Selection To > Enclosing Element" always selects the whole bad range. A normal ASTParser#createAST(..) call doesn't exhibit this problem.
